trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Harper Woods
There were no other sightings in Harper Woods on or around July 19th 2009
Summary: Looked like a shooting star until object increased in size, flashed bright white light, made 180 degree turn and shot off into the sky
divs: sighting detailsbetween around 10:30 pm and 12 midnight on 7-19\ 7-20-2009 we witnessed several star like objects moving across the sky extremely fast making movments unlike any conventional air craft. one in particular shot across the sky from the south east, slowed down then the size increased from a tiny star like object to a super bright orb, made a 180 degree turn, decreased back to what looked like a star and shot off again headed south east. also to the south west (over what would be the down town detroit city area we witnessed an large object that flickered white red and blue (also looked like an orb) but was moving and hovering up and down side to side. definitely was moving intelligently and under controll. did not look like a helicopter\ blimp or other slow moving conventional craft due to the height the object was moving at.
